author: thomreis
body: Fix for Egamma HLT RelVal. Previously, only the 'OR' keyword was known for L1 triggers. Now also 'Or' is recognised. Furthermore, in case that there is an OR of singleEG, doubleEG and tripleEG L1 triggers, the lowest number of candidates necessary is set now for the L1 filter.
title: Fix for Egamma HLT RelVal
